classification_prompt_template:
You are a strict JIRA component classifier for agricultural software issues in the Cropwise ecosystem.

Choose EXACTLY ONE component from this list:
{component_list}

{domain_rules}

Important Constraints:
{constraints}

Analysis Process:
1. Extract key domain terms from title and description
2. Identify the primary entity/domain being discussed
3. Apply rules in priority order
4. Consider external sources/regulatory bodies mentioned
5. Apply important constraints as overrides

Issue Title: {title}

Issue Description:
{description}

Before responding, internally identify the strongest evidence terms and apply the priority rules above.
Respond with ONLY the component name from the list above. Do not explain your reasoning.

components.name: Crop Protection Products
indicators: Crop protection products (pesticides, defensivos, herbicides, fungicides, insecticides, etc.)
Active ingredients, formulations, concentrations, chemical compounds
Product registrations, regulatory approvals, government/agency sources
MRL/LMR, pre-harvest intervals, re-entry intervals, safety intervals
Product labels, DFUs (Directions for Use), application instructions
Crop-pest combinations, dosage rates, application methods
External regulatory datasets (TUBE, HOMOLOGA, AGRIAN, EPA, MAPA)
notes: If the synchronized entity is a product from a crop protection dataset, classify as this EVEN IF the issue is about syncing/ETL parameters
TUBE is a global crop protection database. Issues about TUBE product data belong here
constraints: DO NOT choose Generic Items when there is evidence of crop protection products
Pesticide-related regulatory data (EPA, MAPA, government registrations) = Crop Protection Products
Issues mentioning external crop protection sources (HOMOLOGA, AGRIAN, DEMETER) = Crop Protection Products

components.name: Seeds
indicators: Seed varieties, hybrids, commercial seed products
Seed registrations across different markets
Seed parameters, characteristics, agronomic data
Localized seed varieties for specific regions
Seed SKUs, packaging information, external integrations
Seed parameter sources (CTPS/GEVES, ARVALIS, AHDB, GOV/UK, etc.)

components.name: Fertilizer
indicators: Fertilizers, nutritional inputs, soil corrections
Nutrient composition (N, P, K, Ca, Mg, S, micronutrients)
Foliar feeding vs soil correction applications
Fertilizer registrations and regulatory compliance
Chemical groups, active ingredients in fertilizers
Density, physical form (SOLID/LIQUID)

components.name: Crops
indicators: Crop entities, crop hierarchies (parent/subcrop relationships)
Crop EPPO codes, scientific names
Crop localization for specific countries/regions
Crop taxonomies, crop naming systems
notes: If about growth stages/scales specifically, check Growth Scale and Stage component first
constraints: DO NOT choose Crops when the issue is specifically about growth stages/scales (choose Growth Scale and Stage instead)

components.name: Growth Scale and Stage
indicators: Growth scales (canonical or organization-specific)
Growth stages (EMERGENCE, VEGETATIVE, REPRODUCTIVE)
Stage types, phenological development, BBCH codes, Zadoks scales
Growth stage sequencing and validation
notes: Use this ONLY if the issue is specifically about growth stages/scales, not about the crop itself

components.name: Generic Items
indicators: Generic agricultural resources (services, equipment parts, fuel, plant activators)
Item categories (SERVICE, PART, FUEL, ITEM, PLANT_ACTIVATOR, GENERIC_PRODUCT)
Units of measurement for non-specialized items
notes: Use ONLY if none of the above match and the domain is truly generic/unspecified
This is the fallback component when no specific domain indicators are found
constraints: DO NOT choose Generic Items when there is evidence of crop protection products, seeds, fertilizers, or specialized crop domains
DO NOT choose Generic Items when there is evidence of pesticide regulatory data or government/agency product updates
